it-IT.summary: Chatbot con informazioni sulla salute degli occhi
it-IT.name: Cosmo
it-IT.description:
Per iniziare, dì "Alexa, apri Essilor Cosmo"

In qualsiasi momento, puoi interrompere dicendo "Alexa, interrompi"

en-CA.summary: Learn fun facts about eye health
examplePhrases: Alexa ask essilor cosmo to tell me an eye health fact
en-CA.name: Cosmo
en-CA.description:
To start, just say "Alexa, open Essilor Cosmo"

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

fr-FR.summary: Chatbot avec des faits sur la santé oculaire
fr-FR.name: Cosmo
fr-FR.description:
Pour commencer, dites simplement "Alexa, ouvre Essilor Cosmo"

À tout moment, vous pouvez vous arrêter en disant «Alexa, arrête»
